data.author: Kenny L.

changelog.release_notes: Fixed error in calculating countdown time for automatic updates
Hopefully fixed the crashing issue

BIG 4.0 for 4.0!
Diorite support - BAM
Weather support - BAM
Automatic updates - DOUBLE BAM
Cleaner Code - BAM^2
Good luck, have fun, email me with problems!
Added peek support.  It's ready for Doirite, but cloudpebble struggles to compile the code.  Release soon.

bug fixes
-random problems
-timer not working correct across months because of leap years (whoops)
-something else I'm sure

Turned off test purchases (one of these days I'll learn)
Bug fixes
Forgot to change the influence auto animations had on quiet time.

Fixed: 
UNLV color correction 
Animations might not have happened if delay was not selected. 

Hopefully fixed: 
Quite time not turning off in the morning

Fixed a problem where setting the countdown's gametime to AM was reading it as PM always.
Also fixed a problem where selecting the countdown to always display not working correctly.
And finally fixed the animation problem, should be real smooth now!
Fixed it so if you choose paid options that the team is not set to SC unless you have chosen random.

Well, looks like I had purchases in test mode.

Sorry for the email spams.  But some people might have gotten it for free, so congrats!
Somehow forgot to include the setting to select Michigan State.  Sorry Sparty!  Please email me if you feel like your team is missing.  There are so many that it is very easy to overlook one team.

Somehow forgot to include the animation delay setting. It's back in there. Though, not sure about other people, but the animation doesn't ever quite go all the way. This is highest on my priority list of fixing!
Fixed kiezelpay canceling purchase right after requesting the purchase.

Changed the premium check location.

If selecting premium features, the face will reset all your settings automatically (just in case you don't end up purchasing the full watchface).  If you buy the product and re-submit your setting, then it should no longer reset anything. I'm working towards a more convenient way around this.

Added a lot of new stuff!
That being said, I've implemented KiezelPay. The face without any bells and whistles is available for free, but if you want the countdown feature, health data, or random team support you will have to pay $1. Future updates might be included in this $1, so buy now to make sure you have the most feature rich face! 
New watch support! Now supports Original and Round Pebbles! And it's ready for Pebble 2, and I'm working on Pebble Time 2. 
Clay support: Change your watchface settings without needing an internet connection! 
Health data added. See how many steps you've taken, and try and score a TD by meeting your weekly average. 
ToDo List: Weather (and gameday weather maybe)

Changed Illinois logo
Added Custom Countdown Timer
Added option for delay when showing timer on animation (so if you want the time in a dark place you don't have to wait)
Added random team to beat

Added Team Meteor.
Fixed logo for Ohio State.
Added random favorite team that updates every Sunday
Added countdown to gameday.  Currently it is set to only be able to countdown to 12:00 Eastern Time (or the first game on Saturday)

Set the foundations for random team to beat and custom time for countdown to gametime.  Coming soon.
Fixed blemish on UVA and K State choices
Forgot icon for the watchface drawer

data.description:
Support your favorite college team with this watchface!  It includes every team that plays D1 FBS football and some extra options!

Alabama
UAB
App St
Arizona
